text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Southern | native_name = Ngwaketse | native_name_lang = tsn | type = District | image_skyline = New Ministry building, Gabarone, Botswana - panoramio.jpg | image_alt = Gabaorone ministry building | image_caption = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Botswana - Southern.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Location within Botswana | mapsize = frameless | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Kanye | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 28470 | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 186831 | population_as_of = 2001 census | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = Central Africa Time | utc_offset1 = +2 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Southern is one of the districts of Botswana. The capital city is Kanye. There are three sub-districts: Barolong, Ngwaketse and Ngwaketse West. ==References== Category:Districts of Botswana
title: Southern District (Botswana)
